scripts.db:init-tables: set -a && source .env && cat db/structure.sql | docker exec -i ps_mysql mysql -u root -p$DB_ROOT_PASSWORD --database=$DB_NAME
scripts.db:seed: set -a && source .env && cat db/seed.sql | docker exec -i ps_mysql mysql -u root -p$DB_ROOT_PASSWORD --database=$DB_NAME
scripts.config:update: npm run config:copy -- "$1" "$2" && npm run container:restart -- "$1"
